headline: Is General Dynamics (GD) The Best Defense Stock to Buy in 2025?
summary: General Dynamics Corp (NYSE:GD) is one of the Top 10 Stocks Wall Street is Buzzing About These Days. Citi’s Jason Gursky named General Dynamics Corp (NYSE:GD) as one of the top stocks to benefit from the increasing defense spending in the US and Europe. headline: Hexcel Q2 Earnings Beat Estimates, Sales Decline Y/Y
